items.consumables

Interface Consumable

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Item
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractConsumable, AbstractTimedConsumable, DefensePotion, HealthPotion

    public interface Consumable
extends Item
    This interface starts the Consumable branch of items and contains the statements .getBuffedStat(), .getMod(), .setMod(), .getDuration(), .setDuration(), .apply(), and .remove(). It implements the Item interface.
    Author:
    Dr. Cheese

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void apply(AbstractChar subject)
      This method applies the bonus of the item to a given target Character, modifying any stats as necessary.
      java.lang.String getBuffedStat()
      Finds and returns the name of the buffed stat of the item.
      int getDuration()
      Finds and returns how long the items effect should last, in turns, after its use.
      int getMod()
      Finds and returns the value corresponding to how much the item should add to its buffed stat.
      void setDuration(int newDuration)
      Sets the duration stat of the item to a new value.
      void setMod(int newMod)
      Changes the value corresponding to how much the item should add to its buffed stat.

      • Methods inherited from interface items.Item

        equals, getName, setName, toString

      • getDuration

        int getDuration()
        Finds and returns how long the items effect should last, in turns, after its use.
        Returns:

      • setDuration

        void setDuration(int newDuration)
        Sets the duration stat of the item to a new value.
        Parameters:

      • apply

        void apply(AbstractChar subject)
        This method applies the bonus of the item to a given target Character, modifying any stats as necessary.
        Parameters:
        subject - The target Character to use the item on.
